name: Circuit Racer - 3D Top Racing Game - Best Time To Race
name_original: Circuit Racer - 3D Top Racing Game - Best Time To Race
description:
Circuit Racer is a fun 3D simulation buggy car racing game that puts you in the driver's seat to learn how to drive and race in drizzling rain or shine!

*** High voltage adrenaline rush with countdown mode

*** Timer mode to practice & improve racing speed with less time to complete the lap on various sharp turns and curves of a beautiful race track.

*** Six different modes of camera view of buggy from top sky view to up-close (inside)

*** 10 different colors of buggies - choose your own favorite color

*** Uplifting music for theme, countdown and timer mode.

*** Addictive game play

Thrilling, but also educational, this is a high voltage racing car game and fun learning tool for both kids and teenagers. Breaking, turning, learning optimal speed while avoiding sliding and spinning, or sharp, wide, or blind turning, learn the physics of driving and staying safe behind the wheel. You can see the mark on the road while drifting.

Features include the camera button that allows you to change the inside and outside views including sky view and four more views while driving, car color selector, sound music controls, steering, breaking, and reverse throttle controls to give you full control of your driving and racing experience. Enjoy cloudy blue sky or drizzling scenic rainy day dynamically by pressing control-m during game play. Also watch your speed in digital way.

With beautiful race track, curved and divided roads, and tunnel bridge, you're sure to want to take this baby for a spin and a half.
